dcterms:creator: K. Meng
D. Bau
A. Andonian
Y. Belinkov
dcterms:description: COUNTERFACT dataset contains 21,919 requests {s, r, o, o∗, π∗} where o is the correct answer to the prompt x = (s, r), o∗ is the counterfactual edit request, and π∗ ∼ P (s, r) is a paraphrase of the prompt x = (s, r) to test for generalizability. Each record also contains neighborhood prompts to test for specificity and generation prompts to test if LM generation post-edit is fluent and consistent with the edit.
dcterms:title: COUNTERFACT

dcterms:creator: E. Hernandez
A. Sen Sharma
T. Haklay
K. Meng
M. Wattenberg
J. Andreas
Y. Belinkov
D. Bau
dcterms:description: The RELATIONS dataset consists of 47 relations of 4 types; factual, linguistic, bias, and commonsense. It contains a set of (s, o) for each relation r, focusing on factual relations for the purpose of evaluating linearity in relation decoding.
dcterms:title: RELATIONS
